wikipedia_page.main: Lisa-Marie Long is a British television presenter and actress best known for hosting poker formats for Sky Poker and Matchroom Sport for BskyB, Channel 5 and Sky Sports. She is also a regular poker player and played in the celebrity heat of the Partypoker.net women's world series. As an actress Lisa-Marie has appeared in numerous commercials and television shows and more recently as 'Ellie' in new British feature film The Hike.

response: *Lisa-Marie Long, British television presenter and actress
